issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Enable clippy unnecessary_unwrap / useless_format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10806](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10806). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
enable:
clippy::unnecessary_unwrap,
 clippy::useless_format
